abstract: Medtronic said Monday that it would pay up to $500 million for Invatec, a company that makes medical devices to treat cardiovascular disease.
snippet: Medtronic said Monday that it would pay up to $500 million for Invatec, a company that makes medical devices to treat cardiovascular disease.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic said Monday that it would pay up to $500 million for Invatec, a company that makes medical devices to treat cardiovascular disease, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Medtronic to Buy Stent Maker Invatec
